name: Augment 02 [Summer 2083]
description:
Augment is Shadowrunâ€™s official magazine. This is a fully in-universe publication, and can be used in Shadowrun games as well as enjoyed by the casual reader.

Augment, Summer 2083. The Matrix is magic, and Augment proves it in this issue. Discover the newest deck to hit the market while listening to Ares VP Karen King and Marques Reille go toe-to-toe. Art Director Denidra Boann shares her insights into the art of the page as Hunter Cobb continues to follow the story behind the Tailgate Riots in Denver! Enjoy reviews of new products, clothing, tech, and so much more!

Augment your life with Augment magazine!
